text: haey yeung ban pongrung chetd robsa puokke nowpel del puokke ban chhr( champohmoukh se d ch del kmean chomnue) pelnoh puokke ban niyeay tha mcheasa robsa puok yeung kuchea mcheasa nei mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei . puok yeung min korp sakkar mcheasa na krawpi trong chea dachkhat . ( brasenbae yeung niyeay phe sa ng pi nih) puok yeung pit chea ban niyeay brasacheak pi karpit cheaminkhan
